content: this crochet pattern is available in english with us crochet terminology there are no returns on digital files the pdf is available as an instant download with 13 pages including - written pattern in us terms - photo tutorial - schematic a video tutorial is available on youtube sizes & measurements us women sizes xxs 5 5 5 xs 7 - 7 5 s 8 8 5 s+ 9 - 10 m 10 5 11 5 l 12 12 5 xl 13 14 5 eu sizes xxs 36 - 37 xs 38 s 39 s+ 40 - 41 m 42 - 43 l 44 xl 45 - 46 please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/sneaker-botties please contact me if you have questions about the pattern find me on social media patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
